String.string:
Defeat Empowered Petrax in the Pit of Petrax event dungeon twice.

Use the 'Complete the Pit of Petrax' request in Vanguard Requests (shortcut 'H') to teleport to Highwatch, and speak to Karmok to enter the Pit of Petrax.

You can use a device to the right in the dungeon to activate the Link Leaderboard so you can play the quest.
